title: Navalny (political thriller)
description:
This week, Tig and Cheryl take on "Navalny," a political thriller with a shocking true crime twist. There are twists and turns galore, as well as sidetracks, as Cheryl finally shares her story about almost getting poisoned, and Tig talks about a recent doctor's visit gone wrong. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
